requirements.summary: Create an Images/Gallery section that shows the 8 photos in a responsive grid with consistent spacing, rounded corners, and stable aspect ratio.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a clearly labeled Images/Gallery section visible in the app.
On mobile, the grid adapts to smaller screens (e.g., 1â€“2 columns) and on larger screens uses more columns appropriately.

file_operations.description: Create an Images screen that renders a responsive grid of the 8 static assets with fixed aspect-ratio placeholders to avoid layout shifts, consistent gaps, and rounded corners; compose existing shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Define a single source of truth array for the 8 gallery image entries (label + public src path) using the exact provided filenames for UI references.

requirements.summary: Add navigation entry so users can reach the Images/Gallery section without removing any existing sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate to the Images/Gallery section via an in-app control (e.g., a tab within an existing section or a new entry point) without breaking the current Home/Education/Discipline/Sports/Notices/Dashboard navigation.
No existing navigation item is removed.

file_operations.description: Wire the new Images section into the existing section-switch navigation by extending the AppSection type and adding a render case that displays the new Images screen.
Add an Images navigation item to the existing bottom navigation pattern (keeping all existing items) and adjust layout to accommodate the additional item.

requirements.summary: Enable tap/click-to-preview for each gallery image in a larger overlay/dialog with a clear close action.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping an image opens a larger preview.
The preview can be closed to return to the gallery grid.
The preview works for each of the 8 images.

file_operations.description: Add a reusable preview overlay component for showing the selected image larger and providing a clear close control; use shadcn-ui Dialog to provide accessible modal behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Integrate the preview dialog into the gallery grid by tracking the selected image and opening/closing the dialog on user interaction; ensure every one of the 8 images can be previewed.
